resources.string: Privacy Indicators

When this service is enabled it lets \'Privacy Indicators App\' to display notifications and indicators every time a third-party app or a service uses camera or microphone on any screen. \n\nThis Service/App doesn\'t have any permission to use internet or your device\'s camera, microphone or any other Hardware. And will NOT gather any data whatsoever.
Get notified every time a third-party app uses camera or microphone
Made with ‚ù§ by Nitish
Built in FOSS HACKS 2020
You will get an active notification on the status bar while an app is using your camera or microphone.
Click on the above Switch and Turn on the Privacy Indicator in the Accessibility Settings
Privacy Indicators are disabled
Camera Indicator
Turning this on will enable location dot which monitors app which use GPS service on your phone.
